graph.properties.splitting

Class HopcroftTarjanSplitting<V extends Vertex,E extends Edge<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.properties.splitting.HopcroftTarjanSplitting<V,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The vertex type
    E - The edge type

    public class HopcroftTarjanSplitting<V extends Vertex,E extends Edge<V>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation based on Hopcroft and Tarjan's algorithm: J. E. Hopcroft and R. E. Tarjan, Dividing a graph into triconnected components, SIAM J. Comput. 2 (1973), no. 3, 135â€“158.
    Author:
    Renata
